answers.author: Grant Sparks
answers.text:
All powerpoint presentations will be uploaded to the conference website, www.brownfields2011.org, in the next few days. These presentations will not be uploaded to the ICMA website.

author: Alfred Kovalik
text: I thought I heard that all of the powerpoint presentations were going to be uploaded to the ICMA website.  Is this true and where would I find them?
title: Brownfields 2011 presentation materials and handouts
